price: Na bila ya shaka mtajua khabari zake baada ya muda.
footnotes: Na hapana shaka nyinyi, mnao ikadhibisha Qur'ani, mtakuja jua karibuni hivi ukweli uliomo ndani yake wa ahadi, na maonyo, na khabari za mambo yatakayo kuja, na Ishara za ulimwengu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
